item.title: Trump, Putin to speak before Zelensky’s White House visit, Axios reports
item.description: US President Donald Trump and Russia’s Vladimir Putin will speak on Thursday, one day before Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky visits the White House, Axios reported on Thursday, citing a source with knowledge of the matter. The White House did not immediately respond to a request for c

item.title: EC cancels holidays for its staff to expedite electoral preparation
item.description: The Election Commission (EC) has cancelled weekly and government holidays for its officials and employees both at the headquarters and field-level offices to expedite the preparatory works for the upcoming 13th parliamentary election planned to be held in early February 2026. According to an offic

item.title: Khaleda, Tarique invited to July Charter signing ceremony
item.description: The National Consensus Commission on Thursday invited BNP Chairperson Begum Khaleda Zia and Acting Chairman Tarique Rahman to the signing ceremony of the ‘National July Charter 2025’. Commission members Dr Badiul Alam Majumdar and journalist Monir Hayder, who is also a Special Assistan

item.title: Syngenta Bangladesh & DAE jointly celebrate World Food Day 2025
item.description: Syngenta Bangladesh proudly celebrated World Food Day 2025 on Thursday (16 October) under the global theme ‘Hand in Hand for Better Food and Better Future.’ In collaboration with the Department of Agricultural Extension (DAE) at their regional office in Khulna, the celebration highligh

item.title: Three Habiganj men ‘beaten to death’ in India’s Tripura
item.description: Three men from Habiganj’s Chunarughat Upazila have allegedly been beaten to death in India’s Tripura state. The bodies were handed over to the Border Guard Bangladesh (BGB) by India’s Border Security Force (BSF) through the Kedaraghat border on Thursday evening. Tripura’s

item.title: ACC prosecutes former minister Saber and wife over ‘illicit wealth, money laundering’
item.description: The Anti-Corruption Commission (ACC) has filed two separate cases against former Awami League minister Saber Hossain Chowdhury and his wife, Rehana Chowdhury, over allegations of illegally acquiring and laundering Tk 390 million, along with “suspicious transactions” amounting to Tk 2.81

item.title: Yamal among highest-paid players in 2025 in Forbes list topped by Ronaldo
item.description: Barcelona's 18-year-old winger Lamine Yamal has gate-crashed football's financial elite, landing among Forbes' top 10 highest-paid players in 2025, topped by Portugal forward Cristiano Ronaldo. Ronaldo tops Forbes' latest list with a staggering $280 million in earnings this year, maintaining his s

item.title: More than one million World Cup tickets sold through Visa pre-sales
item.description: More than one million tickets for the 2026 World Cup have been sold following the conclusion of the Visa V.N pre-sales phase, world football’s governing body FIFA said on Thursday. Fans from 212 countries and territories purchased tickets during the pre-sales period, which opened in mid-Sept

item.title: RUCSU elections vote counting under way at girls’ hall
item.description: Vote counting has begun at Rajshahi University four and a half hours after balloting concluded for the student union, hall councils, and senate student elections. On Thursday, the RUCSU Election Commission announced that counting started at the girls’ hall. Completing the entire process and
